title: ChatGPT Atlas
author: easton
aiHeadline: ChatGPT just got a new toy called 'Atlas'—because apparently, world domination wasn't enough, and now it needs a map too.

title: Replacing a $3000/mo Heroku bill with a $55/mo server
author: jryio
aiHeadline: One startup realized that paying $3,000 a month for Heroku was like renting a mansion when you could just build a tiny shed for $55—genius move, or just a sign of the times?

title: Build your own database
author: nansdotio
aiHeadline: Why settle for existing databases when you can build your own? Because clearly, the world isn't broken enough yet.

title: Neural audio codecs: how to get audio into LLMs
author: karimf
aiHeadline: Scientists are now teaching LLMs how to 'listen' to audio—because what could possibly go wrong when AI starts understanding everything we say?

title: Foreign hackers breached a US nuclear weapons plant via SharePoint flaws
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Foreign hackers breached a US nuclear weapons plant via SharePoint flaws—because apparently, even the most secure facilities can't resist the allure of an unpatched software vulnerability.
